data.title: Federal Reserve Faces Challenges in December Rate Cut
data.description: According to BlockBeats, the Federal Reserve's Logan has indicated that a rate cut in December will be challenging. If the repo rates remain elevated, the Federal Reserve will need to consider asset purchases.

data.title: Vanguard Group FTSE Japan ETF Reveals MetaPlanet Stock Holdings
data.description: According to PANews, Vanguard Group FTSE Japan ETF (VJPN) has disclosed its initial holding of 704,500 shares in MetaPlanet, a company listed on BitcoinTreasuries. The shares are valued at approximately $2.1 million.

data.title: Marathon Digital Acquires Exaion with Restrictions on AI and Bitcoin Mining
data.description: According to PANews, Marathon Digital has finalized the acquisition of Exaion, a subsidiary of the French energy company EDF. The terms of the agreement explicitly prohibit EDF from utilizing its computing power for AI training or Bitcoin mining activities.

data.title: Circle Expands Services with Launch on Monad
data.description: According to Foresight News, Circle has announced the launch of USDC, CCTP V2, Circle Wallets, and Circle Contracts on the Monad platform. These services will support developers building applications on Monad by providing decentralized finance (DeFi) and trading applications, payment and fintech solutions, wallets, and cross-chain services.

data.title: Bitcoin Faces Critical Cost Threshold, Potential for Significant Rebound
data.description: According to BlockBeats, glassnode has reported that Bitcoin is once again testing the crucial cost threshold of approximately $109,000, identified as the 0.85 cost zone. Historically, this level has served as a significant dividing line. Maintaining this level often leads to substantial rebounds, while failing to hold it typically results in further declines to the 0.75 cost zone, around $98,000.

data.title: Fed's Commitment to Inflation Target Questioned Amid Employment Balance
data.description: According to BlockBeats, Federal Reserve official Schmid has stated that the employment market is generally balanced, but inflation remains excessively high. He noted that a potential interest rate cut could challenge the Fed's commitment to its 2% inflation target.

data.title: BNB Drops Below 1,090 USDT with a 1.83% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Oct 31, 2025, 12:11 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, BNB has dropped below 1,090 USDT and is now trading at 1,089.310059 USDT, with a narrowed 1.83% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Over 50 Million USDC Destroyed in Treasury Transaction
data.description: According to PANews, Whale Alert has reported that more than 50.24 million USDC were recently destroyed in the USDC Treasury. The transaction is valued at approximately 50.23 million USD.
